selected_links.title: Report a missed bin collection in Belfast
strengths: Directly addresses the issue of a missed bin collection.
Offers online reporting option for ease and convenience.
selected_links.reasoning: The title clearly mentions 'missed bin collection' and the snippet confirms that it is possible to report a missed bin collection online, making it the most relevant answer for council customer information needs regarding their bins.

context.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.

recommendation.reason: Link appears suitable for user needs
next_steps: Follow the link to access the content

Reason.need: I forgot to put my bin out and need to report that I would like it collected.
Reason.reasoning: The content provides clear instructions on how to report a missed bin collection, stating the steps (wait until after 7pm and report online or call the number provided) and the preferred method for reporting (online or phone)
Reason.next_actions: I will wait until after 7 pm on my usual collection day, then visit the given URL or call the provided number to report a missed bin collection

analysis.overall_assessment: The content is informative and helpful in addressing the needs of council residents as it explains various reasons why their bin might not be collected and how to report a missed bin collection. However, there is room for improvement by adding information about estimated times for re-collection or contacting the resident.
key_gaps_or_areas_for_improvement: Contact information in case of further queries
